title: Putting out the garbage
creator_credit: Video Projects, Tony Wright and Julie Harris
brief_description: Domestic violence is the most frequently occurring and under reported crime in Australia. It includes emotional, physical, sexual, financial and social abuse. This video is designed for use by women, community groups, police, schools, professional training bodies and educational organisations.
